scripts.sync: rclone sync -v "drive_gallery:SiLeNtWaLkEr Destiny Emblem Wallpapers" wallpapers/images && node updateCache.js
scripts.update-images: cd wallpapers && git add -A && (git diff --staged --quiet || (git commit -m "Update images" && git push))
scripts.push: git add -A && git commit -m "Update cache" && git push
scripts.update: git pull && npm run sync && npm run update-images && npm run push
